title: Demiurg - The Hate Chamber (2008)
description:
For some reason, it was damn near impossible to find a GOOD review for this album (one that doesn&#039;t contain names of people who no one knows/cares about), which is very surprising consider how incredible it is.  Demiurg was apparently a side-project for some guy, but eventually turned into a full-time production for this album.  This is their second album, following their first "Breath of the Demiurg" which was produced in 2007.

Apparently these guys have been in a wide variety of bands, and are combining for the pure satisfaction of making some ungodly Death Metal (Their guitarist has been in too many fucking bands to count).

What am I trying to say?  Demiurg is surprisingly phenomenal, from start to finish, with songs that will grind your brain into lumps of unrecognizable mush such as "Cremated Lie the Day" and "World Destroyer".  These guys are fan-fucking-tastic, my hat truly goes off to them.  Easy 5/5, now download and seed.

Demiurg

The Hate Chamber - (2008)

1. Resurrecting the Rotting (Flesh Festival pt.II)
2. Cremated Lie the Day
3. The Terror Before Sleep
4. Wolves at the Gates
5. Apocalyptic
6. World Destroyer
7. The Convulse Meridian
8. Dawn Dusk Delusion
9. Opus Morbidity (City of Ib pt. III)
10.Cult of Dagon
